local_intent: Close the gripper on the coke_bottle and verify a stable grasp.
assumptions: Pre-grasp alignment already achieved and the gripper is positioned around the target
coke_bottle is within reachable grasp aperture when closing
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp-closure and verification segment of the global plan: after visibility confirmation, it closes the gripper, then verifies object capture and grasp stability, matching the GLOBAL_BT sequence around CloseGripper → ObjectInGripper → IsGraspStable.
